20 
21 #ifndef __TBB_global_control_H
22 #define __TBB_global_control_H
23 
24 #include "tbb_stddef.h"
25 
26 namespace tbb {
27 namespace interface9 {
28 
29 class global_control {
30 public:
31  enum parameter {
32  max_allowed_parallelism,
33  thread_stack_size,
34  parameter_max // insert new parameters above this point
35  };
36 
37  global_control(parameter p, size_t value) :
38  my_value(value), my_next(NULL), my_param(p) {
39  __TBB_ASSERT(my_param < parameter_max, "Invalid parameter");
40 #if __TBB_WIN8UI_SUPPORT
41  // For Windows Store* apps it's impossible to set stack size
42  if (p==thread_stack_size)
43  return;
44 #elif __TBB_x86_64 && (_WIN32 || _WIN64)
45  if (p==thread_stack_size)
46  __TBB_ASSERT_RELEASE((unsigned)value == value, "Stack size is limited to unsigned int range");
47 #endif
48  if (my_param==max_allowed_parallelism)
49  __TBB_ASSERT_RELEASE(my_value>0, "max_allowed_parallelism cannot be 0.");
50  internal_create();
51  }
52 
53  ~global_control() {
54  __TBB_ASSERT(my_param < parameter_max, "Invalid parameter. Probably the object was corrupted.");
55 #if __TBB_WIN8UI_SUPPORT
56  // For Windows Store* apps it's impossible to set stack size
57  if (my_param==thread_stack_size)
58  return;
59 #endif
60  internal_destroy();
61  }
62 
63  static size_t active_value(parameter p) {
64  __TBB_ASSERT(p < parameter_max, "Invalid parameter");
65  return active_value((int)p);
66  }
67 private:
68  size_t my_value;
69  global_control *my_next;
70  parameter my_param;
71 
72  void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_create();
73  void __TBB_EXPORTED_METHOD internal_destroy();
74  static size_t __TBB_EXPORTED_FUNC active_value(int param);
75 };
76 } // namespace interface9
77 
78 using interface9::global_control;
79 
80 } // tbb
81 
82 #endif // __TBB_global_control_H
